mapper.insert: insert into HXD_EVENT (EVENT_NAME, EVENT_KEY, ID, EVENT_TIME, EVENT_DATA) values (#{eventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eventKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eventTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventData,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into HXD_EVENT
EVENT_NAME,
EVENT_KEY,
ID,
EVENT_TIME,
EVENT_DATA,
